name: Cicy Bell Women's T Shirts Short Sleeve Tees Sunflower Graphic Loose Summer Tops
reviews: I buy a lot of clothes off Amazon, but have never gotten as many compliments as I do when I wear this tee! I bought it in the yellow color which I love, but it‚Äôs also so soft, it washes great and the size fits perfect! I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs true to size but gives just a little extra room without making it look loose. The only drawback would be that the cuffed sleeves never stay up all around, but not a deal breaker at all. I‚Äôd like to buy more in different colors. Mind you, I hate wearing tees and only own a couple, but will buy more if they were all like this. P.S. I never write reviews but had to for this.Update: We‚Äôll, I decided to buy another‚Ä¶rose red. I got it today and sooo disappointed! The fit was COMPLETELY different! 3‚Äù longer, 3‚Äù wider, no cuffed sleeves, plus the sleeves were longer almost to my elbows! How does a company make the same shirt in the same size but in a different color so different in size? I‚Äôve thought about buying another color, but it will be hit or miss whether I get the fit I had in the yellow or a bigger fit as in this one. It‚Äôs a crap shoot lol! I guess I‚Äôll stick with my yellow.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 May 2023

name: Cicy Bell Women's T Shirts Short Sleeve Tees Sunflower Graphic Loose Summer Tops
reviews: Having liked the feel and fit of the medium white tee last summer, this year I tried again.  The pictures of the orange and green ‚Äú neons‚Äù seemed bright I thought might be pretty, or at least fun. Well. chose the orange and got neither. Ugh. The orange is dull. Drab. Lackluster. Seems old.  Not bright. Not neon. Not pretty. And I don‚Äòt know why, but it is not as comfortable or soft as the white, which I wore over and over. It lasted the summer. That medium fit my 5‚Äô2‚Äù 125 lb self nicely.  Collar and turned up sleeves were great. The medium orange is stiff and boxy and  unattractive. Sleeves turned up are still the best part. Was going to wear it to the store but decided to mow the lawn in it. Felt ugly. Maybe I will sleep in it after a few washes and a lot of fabric softener. If it had been a bright neon orange it may have been fun to wear no matter how ill fitting, but instead it is a shade of orange that would make others say  ‚Äúwhy ‚Äòorange‚Äô? ‚Äú  And they‚Äôd be right. Why?
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 May 2023
